clinical_history: Follow-up PET-CT after chemotherapy to assess treatment response.
findings: Focal hypermetabolic activity noted in left lung lower lobe with SUVmax 12.12.
Mild inflammatory uptake in left lung lower lobe region.
Focal increased uptake in left lung lower lobe, recommend further correlation with CT morphology.
No abnormal FDG uptake in the remaining organs.
No evidence of new metastatic lesions compared to prior scan.
Diffuse mild increased uptake in liver, likely benign.
recommendations: Repeat PET-CT in 3–6 months to monitor treatment response.
